Translations.Text: felemma cae emruna ce`alna `aliyeha safileha veemtarna `aleyha hicaratem min siccilim mendud
musevvemeten `inde rabbik. vema hiye mine-zzalimine bibe`id
veila medyene ehahum su`ayba. kale ya kavmi-`budu-llahe ma lekum min ilahin gayruh. vela tenkusu-lmikyale velmizane inni erakum bihayriv veinni ehafu `aleykum `azabe yevmim muhit
veya kavmi evfu-lmikyale velmizane bilkisti vela tebhasu-nnase esyaehum vela ta`sev fi-l'ardi mufsidin
bekiyyetu-llahi hayrul lekum in kuntum mu'minin. vema ene `aleykum bihafiz
kalu ya su`aybu esalatuke te'muruke en netruke ma ya`budu abauna ev en nef`ale fi emvalina ma nesa'. inneke leente-lhalimu-rrasid

kale ya kavmi era'eytum in kuntu `ala beyyinetim mir rabbi verazekani minhu rizkan hasena. vema uridu en uhalifekum ila ma enhakum `anh. in uridu ille-l'islaha me-steta`t. vema tevfiki illa billah. `aleyhi tevekkeltu veileyhi unib
